snippet: The pianist Murray Perahia performed Bach, Beethoven, Schumann and Chopin in a solo recital on Sunday at Avery Fisher Hall.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews solo recital of classical music works performed by pianist Murray Perahia at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: The pianist Murray Perahia performed Bach, Beethoven, Schumann and Chopin in a solo recital on Sunday at Avery Fisher Hall.

headline.seo: Murray Perahia’s Powerful Sound Unfurls at Avery Fisher
headline.main: Indelible Arcs, Reverberating in the Air and Memory
headline.print_headline: Indelible Arcs, Reverberating in the Air and Memory
